If you're looking for a game that is both high-quality and easy to understand, try out CS:GO. It's a first-person shooter that was created by Valve and it only takes an hour or so to learn the basics of the game. CS:GO is already ranked among the top three games on Steam with over 10,000,000 daily players. And if you want to be competitive? You'll have no problem finding teams or clans at any time of day because there are so many people playing this game! Once again, CS:GO is the perfect game for those seeking quality and simplicity in one package.

CS:GO is a multiplayer game which means that it's best enjoyed with other people, and luckily, it has a player base that expands past the tens of thousands each day. One of the main reasons this game continues to grow in popularity is because it's so easy to pick up and play. It only takes a few hours before you feel comfortable enough to start playing against other players.

9 год в бета версии, лагает, движок сурс обновляется примерно никак. По каникулам играют настоящие профессионалы, чьё орлиное зрение способно увидеть передвижение сквозь стены. Затем потрясающее обновление, которое перевернуло эту игру. Но оно ещё не вышло.
